text: Securing a grant for environmental research felt like real adult success.
It really struck me during a major project at work where decisions impacted public health – realizing your professional choices carry real-world consequences is another level of adulting!

Real talk - jumping into major pollution control projects gave me a wake-up call. Suddenly it wasn’t just theories in class; decisions had real-world impact on communities! That weight of responsibility was "Hello adulthood!"
Deadlines mean dinner's at desks more than dining tables sometimes—not ideal but doable if both sides get it's not forever & communicate plenty!
Definitely feel you all here! Childhood settings lay foundations for our future selves – environmentally conscious at work thanks partly due to my hometown’s push towards eco-living spaces early on!
Hometown hustle inspired career path towards sustainability.
